title: Acting as a Spy in the Zombie Clan - Novel Updates
author: 燕双鹰穿皮衣
description:
As soon as the black mist descended, millions of corpses rained down from the sky, and the mighty corpse tribes invaded the earth.
Humans were unprepared to face this new enemy, and could only survive in the black mist.
Endless waves of zombies came like a tide, and the survivors all feared the worst.
Only Liu Sanqian stood up, 'The king of the zombie is my eldest brother. So I will continue to play music and dance, let's continue partying!'>
